name: Pit Stop Hero
description:
This is a game about car racing. Play as the PIT STOP HERO, who helps the blue team to win by placing bananas in front of the red cars and mushrooms in front of the blue cars.

WASD - move

SPACE - pick up item

SPACE - set down item

ESC - quit

IMPORTANT! When launching the game, make sure to set the "Screen Resolution" to 1024 x 768. We're currently working on the resolution issues, but for now, other resolutions will not work correctly.

We are currently working on another game. While we offer Pit Stop Hero for free, we really appreciate any support that you would be willing to give.
